title: Chiisai Sensuikan ni Koi wo Shita Dekasugiru Kujira no Hanashi
synopsis: The third film in Shin-Ei's series of annual WWII themed anime television movies for children "Sensou Douwa" (war story).
related_anime: ['Kiku-chan to Ookami', 'Futatsu no Kurumi', 'Boku no Boukuugou', 'Yakeato no, Okashi no Ki', 'Tako ni Natta Okaasan', 'Umigame to Shounen', 'Sensuikan ni Koi wo Shita Kujira no Hanashi', 'Aoi Hitomi no Onnanoko no Ohanashi']
